channel.title: Help with objects in 508 server
channel.description: Hey everyone... i recently added a few objects into my source. The coding aspects were all fine but when you log on they aren't there until one of the admins types ::object 1 or any other object number is there a way i could make it so they are always there? i never had this problem with 317 but im fairly new to 508's also im having some problems getting my server to save a player's height when they logout.

item.title: Help with objects in 508 server
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

Hey everyone… i recently added a few objects into my source. The coding aspects were all fine but when you log on they aren’t there until one of the admins types ::object 1 or any other object number
is there a way i could make it so they are always there? i never had this problem with 317 but im fairly new to 508’s
also im having some problems getting my server to save a player’s height when they logout.

Read full topic
